Website Ideas

Browse Webdesign Ideas Transformed/Transforming Into Reality by Past, Current, and Future Clients of VMS Consulting and See the Creator-Designer Behind Each Site

Web Ideas:
A website for Bourbon connoisseurs

Sellers and Buyers can converge here to appreciate the finest bourbon has to offer, both new and old, including connecting each other to the proper ecommerce websites where favorite brands can be purchased. Bourbon ratings and user participation points included.

Jennifer Lucado
Feb 5 www.4bourbonlovers.com *Viktor
The Arts of New York

Keeping Broadway alive, virtually. A platform for users to pay a membership fee or book one show performances to watch live Broadway shows being performed online.
Jerry Balsamiq
July 14 www.artsofNY.com *Sarah
Education Storm

A comprehensive platform that incorporates the training of teachers in a user-friendly way to operate virtual learning tools, and, a landing site for creators of virtual learning tools to showcase their products.

James McIntyre
August 3 www.educationstorm.com *Sarah
US Vaccine Highlights

A secure blog open only to approved government scientists to connect with each other and upload vaccine review scientific updates in real time for deeper collaboration.
Rajat Myalarny
May 16 www.vaccineconnect.com *Mahmoud
Coffee on Your Doorstep

A mobile and webbased app that brings coffee to your doorstep each morning, keeping you safer, and in this digital age where more are working from home.
Franny Salloway
August 30 www.coffeenurdoorstep.com *Mahmoud
Your Shopping Haven

A website rivaling the purchasing capacity of amazon but including a user personalization profile page that suggests products an algorithm expects you to like and keeps track of all past orders for easy re-ordering.
Renata Vazquez
Sep 29 www.myshophaven.com *Viktor
Yoga R Us

A website joining virtual yoga instructors with potential students, where classes can be signed up for and paid for in advance or at the start of virtual class.
Jendo Kenoshi
Oct 25 www.yogarus.com *Sarah
